hospital_code: The official identification code of a Scotland hospital.  TreatmentLocation, HospitalCode
hospital_name: The name of the hospital, i.e., of the treatment location.  HospitalName
address_line_1: Line 1 of the hospital address.  AddressLine1
address_line_2: Line 2 of the hospital address.  AddressLine2
address_line_3: Line 3 of the hospital address.  AddressLine3
address_line_4: Line 4 of the hospital address.  AddressLine4
post_code: The post code of the hospital address.  Postcode
hscp_code: The geographic health and social care partnership code of the hospital.  HSCP, https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/geography-codes-and-labels
council_area: The geographic council area code of the hospital.  CouncilArea, https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/geography-codes-and-labels
intermediate_zone: The geographic intermediate zone code of the hospital.  IntermediateZone, https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/geography-codes-and-labels
data_zone: The geographic data zone code of the hospital.  DataZone, https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/geography-codes-and-labels
